item.title: aka Replicability or replication crisis Reproduzierbarkeitskrise, auch Replizierbarkeitskrise oder Replikationskrise [Reproducibility crisis (aka Replicability or replication crisis)]
Artificial Intelligence Ontologie in der Künstlichen Intelligenz [Ontology (Artificial Intelligence)]
COAR Community Framework for Good Practices in Repositories
COBIDAS [Committee on Best Practices in Data Analysis and Sharing (COBIDAS)]
COG, Beschränkungen der Generalisierbarkeit [Constraints on Generality (COG)]
collaborative commentary Gegnerischer kollaborativer Kommentar [Adversarial (collaborative) commentary]
File Drawer Problem Publikationsverzerrung; Aktenschubladenproblem [Publication bias (File Drawer Problem)]
FLAE, Norm der Betonung der Erst- und Letztautor:innenschaft [First-last-author-emphasis norm (FLAE)]
Freiheitsgrade von Forschenden [Researcher degrees of freedom]
Garten der Weggabelungen [Garden of forking paths]
GDPR, dt. Datenschutzgrundverordnung DSGVO [General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)]
in science Matthew-Effekt in der Wissenschaft [Matthew effect (in science)]
NETANOS [Named entity-based Text Anonymization for Open Science (NETANOS)]
NIRO-SR [Non-Intervention, Reproducible, and Open Systematic Reviews (NIRO-SR)]
öffentliches Vertrauen in die Wissenschaft [Public Trust in Science]
Open Researcher and Contributor ID [ORCID (Open Researcher and Contributor ID)]
Open Science Open Science Abzeichen [Badges (Open Science)]
or Guest Authorship geschenkte Autor:innenschaft / Gastautor:innenschaft [Gift (or Guest) Authorship]
peer review openness initiative PRO Initiative
Peer-Review nach der Veröffentlichung [Post Publication Peer Review]
PPI, Einbindung von Patient:innen und Öffentlichkeit [Patient and Public Involvement (PPI)]
QRPs Fragwürdige Forschungs- oder Veröffentlichungspraktiken [Questionable Research Practices or Questionable Reporting Practices (QRPs)]
Schöpferische Zerstörung als Herangehensweise an Replikationen [Creative destruction approach to replication]
SIPS [Society for the Improvement of Psychological Science (SIPS)]
Software mit offenem Quellcode [Open Source software]
SORTEE [Society for Open, Reliable, and Transparent Ecology and Evolutionary biology (SORTEE)]
the system das System überlisten [Gaming (the system)]
to Open Scholarship Bottom-Up Ansatz [Bottom-up approach (to Open Scholarship)]
Verantwortungsvolle Forschung und Innovation [Responsible Research and Innovation]
